text: Number 41, Lovander Ladner, Petitioner, versus United States of America.
Mr Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
I just want to deal with the Government's last point which isn't conceded in my brief.
Mr. Rosenwald, we -- well the Court thanks you for accepting this assignment and for the service you've rendered.
It's very kind of you, Mr. Chief Justice.
Mr. Sand, of course, we -- we express our same appreciation to you for your representation of the Government.
